plot: Brad Pattison, a world-renowned dog behaviourist, takes problem dogs and their problem owners on an intense journey of healing, allowing them to rediscover the joy of a partnership between man and his best friend.
title: Stepping in It
plot_es: Brad Pattison, a world-renowned dog behaviourist, takes problem dogs and their problem owners on an intense journey of healing, allowing them to rediscover the joy of a partnership between man and his best friend.
plot_en: Brad Pattison, a world-renowned dog behaviourist, takes problem dogs and their problem owners on an intense journey of healing, allowing them to rediscover the joy of a partnership between man and his best friend.
